attributes.action: Need to regulate food pricing so that the cost of food is not reduced for those who can afford and have space to store large quantities of food.
attributes.additional_details: Regulation of supermarket food pricing as at present pricing policies benefit those in society who can afford and have space to store large quantities.  These policies also contribute to food waste.  We all need to eat and those on low incomes or single people should not be unfairly disadvantaged by higher costs for the quantities they need.
